title: Minecraft 1.8.3 [All Versions|Achivements|servers]
description:
Update: zhh0000zhh is currently working on launcher version 5 and will be available in the near future. Among other updates, it will also include new language packs.
There is no version 4 cuz zhh0000zhh is following Microsoft in their marketing decision, and skipping immediately to v5! 


== About the game:

Minecraft is a game about breaking and placing blocks. At first, people built structures to protect against nocturnal monsters, but as the game grew players worked together to create wonderful, imaginative things.
It can also be about adventuring with friends or watching the sun rise over a blocky ocean. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pretty. Brave players battle terrible things in The Nether, which is more scary than pretty. You can also visit a land of mushrooms if it sounds more like your cup of tea.

== Launcher features:

Download and play all Minecraft versions including official versions, beta and alpha versions, and weekly snapshots 
Download Forge/Forge Mod Loader versions from within launcher
Download Optifine versions from within launcher
Login available for genuine as well as offline play (which still includes play on cracked servers)
And more...


== Version:

This is full Minecraft latest version 1.8.3, original files, no cracks. Only one special launcher - made by zhh0000zhh.
Nothing to install, game is already downloaded


== Instructions:

a) Optional: Put the files (.minecraft folder, launcher and logo) into "C:Users\AppDataRoaming" folder and run the launcher
But generally, you can keep them anywhere you want.
b) In launcher, select 1.8.3, enter nickname, and if you wish change other parameters you can, and launch. 

or

b) In section Download center select your version (official is the stable version) and click "Download". 
c) It may ask you (in awkward English translation) to download "Res" files. Click YES. Wait for download.
c) In section Launch select your version, choose player name and Launch. That's it.


== System Requirements:

Minimum:
Pentium 4 1.6GHz/Athlon XP 1600+
GeForce 4 MX 440/Radeon HD 3200
500 MB GD RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 8
1 GB hard disk space

Recommended:
Pentium 4 3.0GHz/Athlon XP 2600+
GeForce 8600 GS/Radeon HD 6320
1 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9
1 GB hard disk space

== TIPS:

- Minecraft version 1.8.3 is already downloaded, just run the launcher, select 1.8.3, enter nickname and play.
- You can delete everything from the .minecraft folder and the launcher will download it again for you!
- When downloading Forge/Optifine - if it asks you to go from page just hit "refresh" () icon in upper left.
- If you want to install FORGE, OPTIFINE AND MODS through launcher check Readme .
- Included some survival island seeds for 1.7x and 1.8x versions. Enjoy!


 If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding! Or better yet 
support game development and BUY IT!


Game created by Mojang.
